body.name: Travel Steamer Iron for Clothes Mini, Portable 180° Rotating Handheld Steamer Travel Iron, Support Dry and Wet Ironing for Home Travel College (White)

features: 【20s Fast Heating】The mini steam iron for clothes has 1000 watts power, which can heat up quickly in 20 seconds for 302℉ constant temperature ironing. Much faster than traditional steam irons, getting clothes back to new in no time. The ceramic titanium non-stick soleplate of the mini steamer iron is very durable, conducts heat quickly and evenly, ensures smooth sliding on the fabric, effectively removes wrinkles, and better protects your clothes.

【Steamer and Iron 2 in 1】This 2-in-1 steamer for clothes can be a normal iron or a steamer iron to meet different ironing needs. When you plug in the steamer without pressing the button, then you will get an iron. After pressing the button, you can use it as a steamer. It is highly recommended to use steamer mode which has a better effect than iron.

【Precise & Versatile】Our mini steam iron features a triangular tip design that allows for 360° ironing, making it easy to tackle narrow areas like shirt buttons, plackets, and dress collars. Suitable for ironing a variety of fabrics, including organic fabrics, nylon blends, wool, cotton, linen, and more.

【Family Travel Essentials】: The powerful portable mini clothing iron efficiency makes life more refined, auto ironing machine easily removes wrinkles on fabrics such as clothes, shirts, curtains, bed sheets, plush, cotton, linen, and other fabrics. Handheld iron can save space, is a lightweight, compact design, and very suitable for travel and outing use. It can be easily put into suitcases and backpacks and can be easily carried anytime, anywhere.

【Portable Steam Iron Travel Size】The foldable handle design of the portable steamer iron for clothes provides convenience for your storage, 180° flexible switching for flat ironing and hanging ironing. The body is very small and light, weighing only 1 pound, it can be put into a handbag. This travel steamer iron is suitable for all kinds of fabrics, and you can take it with you on vacation or travel, and iron anytime, anywhere.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The micro clothing steamer has both dry and wet ironing experience to meet individual ironing needs. Turning on the power, and they can be heated to 302°F quickly, you can iron your clothes directly, for the better and faster ironing effect, you can also press the water spray button to spray water and then iron the clothes. Preheat must be completely: After plugging in the power supply, I suggest waiting for at least 20 seconds to preheat before pressing the steam button, because the water needs to reach a certain temperature to become steam, if the steam button is pressed in advance, the water has not reached the steam temperature, and the high temperature pressure in the water tank will squeeze out the water that has not been atomized, which is the reason for most leaks.

Rated voltage: 110V, 970 W high power, softens fibers and removes wrinkles quickly; 100 ml water tank; 20 s to warm up, quick ironing in 3 minutes, and you can go out exquisitely in just one song time. The front of the heating plate is designed in a triangular tip shape, and 360-degree ironing without dead angle, which allows flexible ironing of narrow areas such as buttons, plackets, and collars.

The handle can have three angled points to meet different iron usage, and can be rotated 0°-90°-180° to adjust the space for holding the handle. The travel clothes steamer uses a 100 ml integrated water tank design, it is convenient to add water with the filling cup to prevent splashes, you can check the water level in the tank at any time. In the case of steam ironing, the high heat of the titanium top can also be used for drying. When using, avoid the product completely upside down. After use, pour away the excess water in the water tank to avoid water leakage from the water inlet when the product is inverted or stored.

The travel iron mini with steam adopts titanium panel heating, constant temperature of 302°F heating ironing does not hurt clothes. can for ironing organic fabrics, nylon blend, wool, cotton, linen and much more. can effectively removes crease and wrinkle of your clothing. Please note: Since we need to test each iron with water, there will be a small number of water stains remaining, which is normal.

The handheld steamer for clothes has a powerful steam function, which can continuously output steam with one button opening, and the steam volume can reach 16g/min. The delicate steam has strong penetrating power, which can easily and effectively soften the fibers of clothes deeply, and remove various wrinkles and stubborn creases. The 100ml/3.4oz large water tank can hold enough water, and the steam can work continuously for about 8 minutes.
It's compact, lightweight, and foldable, making it ideal for travel and outings. Easily pack it into suitcases or backpacks and carry it with you wherever you go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Travel
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is nice. It is small and compact, but able to get the job done. It's easy to use. When I got it, I thought I could steam upright like other steamers, but this is not the case. This is more of an iron with a steamer feature. There are no buttons to adjust the temperature or the heat of the steamer iron, but it's never burnt my clothes, with or without the steamer feature turned on. The steamer doesn't take long too heat up.I have travelled with it, and it travels well. The steamer iron folds in a way that makes it easy to pack up in a suitcase or luggage. You may need to find a space to put the small pitcher cup, as putting water in the steamer without it can be quite a hassle. I do wish that the steamer came with a case to hold the two pieces that come with it. Also, make sure that you have a flat surface that you can put your clothes on to use the steamer. It can work upright, but it takes longer and is a lot harder to use. Most hotels have an ironing board which would get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sleek Steam Companion
reviews.reviewText: I recently added a new steamer iron to my collection, mirroring one I already have. This one stands out for its compact size, which allows for swift setup and storage.The device doubles as a steamer and an iron, but using it as an iron comes with a small hitch – the steam doesn't auto-off when you pause, so you'll need to manually toggle it to avoid over-steaming your clothes.Where it really wins points is in its steaming function. The arm's swivel design grants better handling, a feature my other steamers lack. Plus, it doesn't sputter water, sparing my clothes from those dreaded wet patches.It's not just functional; my fiance loves its sleek design, finding it both modern and stylish. Its small size and ease of use make it perfect for travel – a trusty tool for on-the-go garment care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This steamer is amazing works instantly and it remove wrinkles like you would not believeOn my video, you can see it literally lifting wrinkles upon contact. It took me maybe two minutes to do the whole back of this particular blouse.Definitely fill the steamer full and keep track of how much water you have in there because you’ll probably have to refill it if you have more than one blouse to doI’m actually excited to start steaming my clothes because I have a product that is so fabulous this is super lightweight and easy to use it so small you’ll definitely want to pack it when you travelIt also comes with a plate to set it on when it’s done being used which is super handy because you don’t want to set hot things anymoreThe only things that I didn’t like was the length of the cord I love that it’s a braided cord but it’s a little short so you’re definitely gonna wanna make sure that your clothes are close to a outlet when you’re steaming

reviews.reviewerName: Making Time for MemoriesMaking Time for Memories
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little steamer, works great and is compact
reviews.reviewText: I never imagined that a steamer so compact and easy to travel with, would work as great as this one does. I'm truly blown away. It's super easy to use - just add a little water to the reservoir, plug it in, give it a minute to heat up, and press the button to start the steam. It comes with a small tray to sit it in too, so you don't burn anything when it's not in use. The handle swivels outward so you don't burn yourself when using it and then swivels back for compact storage. It's definitely a great size for travel and doesn't take up very much room in luggage, but can also be used at home on an everyday basis. Plus, it does a really great job at getting wrinkles out of clothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable steamer!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great steamer/iron to throw in my travel bag so that I can get wrinkles out of my clothes! It is a small form factor but produces a good amount of steam. Plug and go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very small/compact for travel. Does the job just fine.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this little travel iron and steamer for exactly the purpose of travel.Comes with directions/guide, cup, base, and steam iron.Everything was packaged really well and had no issues out of the box.Really like the look of this little iron with the trim in white. It is very elegant looking. The cord is long enough to do what you need to do, but not so long to be a headache when trying to pack it back up. I'm able to steam and iron my clothes just fine. I don't have a travel ironing board, so I either hang the clothes form the hanger to steam them or put them on a towel to do a quick touch up ironing. Works pretty well for that.There's no settings like in most house steam irons besides plugging this in, the iron heating up, and being able to turn the steam on and off. The handle rotates and locks at 0, 90, and 180 degrees.Overall, there's not much more to be said for this little travel friendly steam iron. It does exactly the job it needs to do and not much more. It just looks really nice doing it and then folds away easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product but very short cable
reviews.reviewText: This is the cutest steamer I've owned and I love the colors and the functionality but my only *real* complaint is that the cord isn't very long. It's better for using with an ironing board that is stationary. Also if it's at a crazy angle, like it being completely vertical, it will have a problem pulling the water from the reservoir but I've noticed that with a lot of the steamer irons and as long as you keep it relatively flat it doesn't have that issue, so that is somewhat of a nonissue and is probably not intended to be used in the way I was trying to use it (i.e. to steam out wrinkles in curtains that are currently still hung instead of taking the curtain down).
